= Introduction =

By now, RVT is a pretty simple perl script that could be run almost without installation, but some prerequisites have to be taken into account.


= Requirements =

 * linux OS  (tested on Debian stable)
 * The Sleuthkit (tested on v2.06)
 * Perl (tested on v5.8.8)
 * other minor components that i have to add...
 * lots of pacience
